comment._content: Hadn't realized this before, but this must have been taken from the roof of the New York Public Library's 42nd Street building (west side, facing south)

comment.author: 96536917@N00
comment._content: The NYPL's roof is in the foreground. This photograph appears to have been taken from the north side of 42nd Street. Lovely.
